trans-unit.target: TEXT_GAIUSA609_00771_SEQ_00<tab>Cuthbert of Quarrymill would seek your aid in recovering a family heirloom.

TEXT_GAIUSA609_00771_SEQ_01<tab>The notorious Redbelly Wasps have in their possession a priceless heirloom that once belonged to Cuthbert's grandfather, the elder of the ill-fated village of Boughbury. Venture near Redbelly Hive and recover the axe.
TEXT_GAIUSA609_00771_SEQ_02<tab>You have safely recovered the Boughbury Axe from the vicious bandits. Cuthbert will be overjoyed to see it returned after so many years.
TEXT_GAIUSA609_00771_SEQ_03<tab>Taking his grandfather's prized heirloom in hand, Cuthbert swears vengeance against those who stole from his family their rightful home.
TEXT_GAIUSA609_00771_TODO_00<tab>Recover the Boughbury Axe near Redbelly Hive.
TEXT_GAIUSA609_00771_TODO_01<tab>Deliver the Boughbury Axe to Cuthbert.

TEXT_GAIUSA609_00771_CUTHBERT_000_000<tab>In the days before the Calamity, my grandfather was village elder of Boughbury. We tried─gods be good, we tried─to reclaim his home, but to no avail. Passed away last year, he did...

TEXT_GAIUSA609_00771_CUTHBERT_000_001<tab>With his last breath, he spoke of a family heirloom, an axe passed down for generations. Now those Redbelly whoresons use it to split wood─mockin' us all the while. The Twelve take me if I allow those bastards to besmirch Grandfather's memory any longer. You'll bring it back for me, won't you?
TEXT_GAIUSA609_00771_CUTHBERT_000_010<tab>Well? Were you able to reclaim the axe from those bloody thieves?

TEXT_GAIUSA609_00771_CUTHBERT_000_020<tab>Just as Grandfather always described it! You're a godssend, friend. Grandfather, I swear to you─the next time a Redbelly sees this axe, it'll be buried in his good-for-naught skull!
